snippet.title: This vaporware Quake III total conversion had some IMPRESSIVE audio! 🎧
snippet.description:
Actual gameplay starts at 0:40 with a short peek at the Deathmatch level at 6:07. Use headphones only with any virtual surround features turned off. Best HRTF effect at 1:11.

https://archive.org/details/SidrialTCWin32
This is a demonstration of Sidrial with OpenAL Soft's HRTF (IRC_1037 tables) in ioquake3. Sidrial was a very ambitious and obscure Total Conversion mod for Quake III Arena by Fountainhead Entertainment Inc. It boasted Machinima cutscenes, a single-player storyline, and a fully-fledged multiplayer arena. With all this going for it, how did Sidrial fall into obscurity while other games like Nexuiz, OpenArena, and Reflex remain well-known among the Quake fandom?

Simple: it's vaporware.

Sidrial never got past the tiny demo you see now before you. The storyline was apparently finished in a separate "Battle Over In Machinimation[1], but I wouldn't know anything more about that. It's really tragic, too, as this is some of the most impressive stuff I've ever seen made for Quake 3. Sidrial feels like an indie throwback along the lines of Ion Maiden, but it's actually a real product from 2002. The jetpack mechanics are really awesome and make Sidrial feel unique among all the other arena FPS titles of the time. I also really dig the two music tracks because they remind me of Alexander Brandon's work on Deus Ex and UT99.

I wish I could show you more of Sidrial, but you only get one life with no saves and I just don't know how to get past the crusher traps without God Mode. The only other video shows an even harder crusher trap that makes me wonder if they even playtested this level:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fW47OCY5kr4&t=6m25s


HRTF grade:
A (no vertical HRTF)

Settings:
Windows Control Panel: Stereo
cg_fov "115.63"
IRC_1037 HRTF tables placed in %APPDATA%/OpenAL/HRTF
(in alsoft.ini located in %APPDATA%)
channels=stereo
frequency=44100
stereo-mode=headphones
cf_level=0
sample-type=float32
periods=3
period_size=1024
default-hrtf=irc_1037_44100
hrtf=true

Links:
[1]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AEBGREP7M0o
http://openal-soft.org/
https://mega.nz/#!OTpDkQhY!i6NIUTAwopa2pilAiEL-pBxPOzrPLD_vHQMcCRdFLLs
(download personalized HRTF presets here)

(Use of this logo falls under fair use laws.)



#3dsound #spatialaudio #binaural #3daudio #360audio #8daudio #hrtf #headphones #audiophile #gameaudio #retrogaming #quake #mod #machinima
3D 3Д звук пространственный бинауральный 3Dサウンド バイノーラル 空間オーディオ Ilusión Auditiva Sonido 3D áudio audio espacial Som em 3D 3D zvok Son en 3D 3D geluid 3D zvuk 3d声音 双耳 เสียง 3D Âm thanh 3D Suono 3D audio spaziale 3d-ääni binauraalisen 3D lyd 3D dźwięk Suara 3D 3D 사운드 3 डी साउंड 3 डी ध्वनि صوت ثلاثي الأبعاد صدای سه بعدی Τρισδιάστατος ήχος 3D skaņa 3D garsai 3D ses צליל תלת ממדי דימוי שמע
